data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Zhi-Sheng, Hu, Dong-Sheng, Zhang, Yao-Guang (2012): Notes on the spider genus Lathys Simon, 1884 (Araneae: Dictynidae), with description of four new species from China. Zootaxa 3359: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281616
